title: Activision Stock Has Run Up Too High, Analyst Says
text:
Wall Street has grown increasingly optimistic about Activision Blizzard’s prospects given possible upside from World of Warcraft: Classic and Call of Duty. An analyst at Bernstein thinks such hopes have made the stock too expensive.

The back story. Since Barron’shighlighted possible upside to Activision stock (ticker: ATVI) at the end of August, a handful of analysts have become increasingly bullish, many echoing our view that the company’s recent and upcoming releases could outperform expectations. The stock rose 4.5% from...
description: Bernstein’s Todd Juenger lowered his rating on Activision stock to Underperform from Market Perform, though he raised his price target to $43 from $41. The new price target is materially below the current market price.
